main.name: Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror
Archfiend Emperor, the First Lord of Horror

notes.text:
sylvans ain't got nothin on the archfiend THOT patrol 
9 big guys basically means god tier mills. a hero emerges was an idea from the archfiend channel, worked great with 9/10 monsters being targets
sylvans and geargias are good matchups, heroes are decent w/ 3 invaders, not too many spellbooks but it seems they are much harder if go first and set up fate, cyber angels are oof
gl out there fellow archfiends, hope i see more lists
